title: Preformation
description: One is dead. One is reborn. One is a murderer. All will be tested.Andrew has failed. The Grinning Man is dead. Separated from his allies, he’s reunited with a mysterious man from his past—a man who may hold more than just the key to his identity. Together, they embark on a journey of discovery, searching for answers across a land both treacherous and wild.Meanwhile, Mendak and Arely learn their love comes at an overwhelming cost. Returning home, they face impossible choices that lead to the truth of who they really are—and what they’ve unleashed in order to be together.And off on her own, Lily unearths a terrifying link to the past—one that has devastating consequences for them all.
author: Nick  Askew
